headline: Broadridge Financial Solutions (NYSE:BR) Partners With OneDigital To Enhance Retirement Business
summary: Broadridge Financial Solutions (NYSE:BR) recently announced a partnership with OneDigital Financial Services to enhance their retirement business capabilities. This collaboration, which includes data aggregation and enhanced business reporting tools, came amid market fluctuations and broadly positive trends, with major indices posting gains despite tariff uncertainties. Broadridge's stock price movement last week remained essentially flat, aligning with the mixed market conditions, as the Dow...
